name: Angelic Soloist
description:
this one is barely a game, actually it is more of an application! why am i posting this here? anyway this in this game all you had to is to just listen to the provided music and then insert the corresponding notes into the incomplete sheet music. then you can check whether or not was your guess correct. Its pretty boring in my opinion, but it might help with your overall musical hearing and basic sheetmusic terminologies regarding our "learn" section in the game.
